thread.section_title: Intrepid Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intrepid Travel | www.intrepidtravel.com
thread.title: Garry Cutts
thread.title_full: Intrepid Travel reviewed by Garry Cutts

author: Garry Cutts
title: Garry Cutts
text:
Have travelled with Intrepid 5 times now. Peru, Indochina, Vietnam, Victoria Falls to Capetown and Northern Thailand.
Always very well organised. The guides have been extraordinary. They are always willing to take into account the groups dynamics and what the group would like to do.
My 6th trip is Cycle Central America. Can't wait!!!
Keep up the great work Intrepid.
